revised_title: Exploring the Correlation between Amino Acid Sequence and Axial Structure in Collagen
tldr: The authors study the correlation between amino acid sequence and axial structure in collagen using X-ray diffraction, electron microscopy, and amino acid sequence analysis. They construct a model for the native tendon pattern and reveal the role of teleopeptides in the structure. The findings provide a detailed understanding of the structure of tendon and its relation to the fibrous long spacing structure.
